name: Survive: Can you survive the night alone?
name_original: Survive: Can you survive the night alone?
description:
A short interactive horror story. Will you make the correct decisions to stay safe?

=INSTRUCTIONS= Turn up your volume. Use the mouse to click through the narrative as well as select options. Careful where and when you click as you may skip dialogue or accidentally click on options.

=WARNING= Horror themes. May not be appropriate for younger children.

Some original music made with Audacity Audio resources: Freesound.org Font resources: Fontsquirrel.com Visual resources: Pixabay Visual Editing: Powerpoint First time I've used Scratch. Made this to test the coding language. Feedback welcome. *** I can't be bothered inserting a "Try Again" button. If you don't reach the desired ending and you want to play again you must face the shame of clicking the go button again. ***
